articles.author: Amanda Cassidy
articles.title: Meet the Irish astrophysicist aiming for the stars - image.ie
articles.description: Cillian Murphy is an Irish astrophysicist working towards becoming an astronaut with the European Space Agency
articles.content:
“Ive always had a curious mind. 
Ive loved science, discovery, and exploration since I can remember. My mom loves to tell a story that when I was only four or five years old, I was told I could pick… [+8800 chars]

articles.title: European call centre accused of intrusively monitoring home workers - The Irish Times
articles.description: UK-based Teleperformance home workers told to expect remote monitoring by video
articles.content: A multinational call centre used by dozens of leading UK companies has been criticised for what unions have called the intrusive monitoring of home-working staff and their families, as well as asking… [+4503 chars]
